Class DentalRecords

java.lang.Object
DentalRecords
public class DentalRecords extends Object
The DentalRecords program manages tooth data for a family in Florida. It allows users to: - Input family members and their upper/lower teeth records - Print all teeth records - Extract (remove) specific teeth - Compute root canal indices using a quadratic formula. This program validates user inputs to ensure that menu options and tooth types are case-insensitive and within specified limits.
Author:
Muhammad Ahsan Saleem

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method that gets the number of people in the family, calls methods to fill the arrays, and gets the menu option from the user.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used)

    • getFamilyData

      public static void getFamilyData(char[][][] familyTeethRecord, String[] familyNames)
      Collects the names and teeth data for each family member.
      Parameters:
      familyTeethRecord - a 3D array storing teeth data for all family members
      familyNames - an array storing the names of all family members

    • checkForValidTeeth

      public static boolean checkForValidTeeth(String teeth)
      Validates a string of teeth characters. Ensures the string contains only 'I', 'B', or 'M' and does not exceed max length.
      Parameters:
      teeth - a string representing teeth types
      Returns:
      true if valid, otherwise false

    • getMenuOption

      public static String getMenuOption()
      Displays the main menu and returns the selected option.
      Returns:
      a single uppercase letter representing the menu choice ('P', 'E', 'R', 'X')

    • printTeethRecord

      public static void printTeethRecord(char[][][] familyTeethRecord, String[] familyNames)
      Prints all teeth records for the family.
      Parameters:
      familyTeethRecord - the 3D array containing teeth information
      familyNames - the array of family member names

    • extractTooth

      public static void extractTooth(char[][][] familyTeethRecord, String[] familyNames)
      Allows the user to extract a tooth by selecting a family member, jaw, and tooth number. Validates inputs to ensure the tooth exists and is not already missing.
      Parameters:
      familyTeethRecord - the 3D array containing teeth information
      familyNames - the array of family member names

    • familyMemberIndex

      public static int familyMemberIndex(String[] familyNames, String nameToCheck)
      Finds the index of a family member in the names array.
      Parameters:
      familyNames - the array of family member names
      nameToCheck - the name to search for
      Returns:
      the index of the member if found, otherwise -1

    • performRootCanal

      public static void performRootCanal(char[][][] familyTeethRecord)
      Calculates and prints the two root canal indices using the quadratic formula: Ix² + Bx - M = 0
      Parameters:
      familyTeethRecord - the 3D array containing all teeth information

    • exit

      public static void exit()
      Prints an exit message when the program ends.
